chunk_text:
DevDays Online Recordings

The recordings from our recent DevDays Online events are now publicly available. They cover API-related information about much of the 2010 family of products.

Here is a link to the recording of the AEC session (47.5 MB).

The links for the AutoCAD, Geospatial, Manufacturing and Civil 3D domains are available from Kean's blog Through the Interface.
